game.name: The Albion Plague
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Albion Plague is a 2D RPG with point-and-click mechanics, faction management, and a refined choice-and-consequence system based on fully customizable playstyles. Use every skill at your disposal to save Ulma, prevent a catastrophic civil war, and protect her from a terrifying enemy...
